title: Help
content: I took admission in PES around 2 and I don‚Äôt understand half the terms people are using in the discord server or WhatsApp group. How am I supposed to know when clg is starting or when the orientation is or which class I am in . please HELP

comments.body:
DM
I'm willing to help you out
Next time someone uses a term you don't know, just ask. Seniors are helpful and will help you out.

If the terms include gyatt, skibidi, rizz , then you're better off not knowing 
Otherwise just Google it up
Need Help: What's the additional fee in college for KCET
No I got my admission done they did not ask anything
woah, what about the scholarship fee?
Oh idk they told nothing about it
Bro clg starts from Monday and to know ur class, go to pesuacademy and click know your class and section, then type your prn no or srn or email id and u will get to know about it.¬†
